metadata.feature_description: Provides adaptive user interface that works across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.action: Resize browser to 1920x1080 and navigate to PersonaBar
steps.expected: PersonaBar should display correctly with full menu icons and content panels at desktop resolution
steps.actual: PersonaBar displayed correctly with icon-only sidebar navigation, Community Analytics panel opened with full content visible, main website content visible on the right side

steps.action: Open Pages panel at desktop resolution
steps.expected: Pages panel should show page tree on left and details form on right with proper spacing
steps.actual: Pages panel displayed with full page tree, Details/Permissions/Advanced tabs, and form fields all properly visible and spaced

steps.action: Resize browser to 768x1024 (tablet portrait) and view Pages panel
steps.expected: PersonaBar and panels should adapt to tablet size with usable layout
steps.actual: PersonaBar remained as icon-only sidebar, Pages panel displayed with page tree and details form visible, 'Menu' link appeared in main site navigation indicating mobile/tablet mode, 'Advanced' tab label partially cut off showing layout adaptation

steps.action: Resize browser to 375x667 (mobile portrait) and view Pages panel
steps.expected: PersonaBar should adapt to mobile with touch-friendly elements
steps.actual: PersonaBar displayed as narrow icon-only sidebar, Pages panel showed page tree list, detail form hidden requiring selection of a page to view details

steps.expected: Dashboard panels should stack and adapt to mobile width
steps.actual: Site Analytics dashboard adapted to mobile width with Insights section and warning dialog visible

steps.action: Close PersonaBar panel and view main site at mobile
steps.expected: Main site navigation should collapse to mobile menu
steps.actual: Main site showed 'Menu' hamburger link, SuperUser Account dropdown visible, content displayed in single column layout with full-width 'Learn More' button

steps.action: Click Menu link on mobile to expand navigation
steps.expected: Navigation should expand to show all page links in vertical list
steps.actual: Menu expanded correctly showing all navigation links (HOME, OUR PRODUCTS, GROUPS, TEST PAGE ONE, NEWS, etc.) in a vertical scrollable list with submenu indicators for pages with children

steps.expected: Layout should adapt to landscape orientation
steps.actual: PersonaBar remained on left side, expanded mobile menu visible with navigation links, search box appeared below header in landscape mode

steps.expected: Layout should show more content in landscape view
steps.actual: Mobile menu still active at this breakpoint (1024px width), navigation links displayed in vertical list, long page names wrapped correctly within available width

steps.expected: UI elements should scale proportionally and remain usable
steps.actual: PersonaBar icons scaled appropriately, navigation menu wrapped to multiple lines, all text readable and scaled correctly, icons remained proportional

steps.expected: More content should be visible with smaller UI elements
steps.actual: More content visible on screen, PersonaBar icons smaller but clearly visible, navigation showed many items with some wrapping, main content area with hero section and product image visible

steps.expected: Layout should use desktop/large screen mode
steps.actual: Navigation displayed as full horizontal menu (no Menu button), PersonaBar icon-only on left, all navigation links visible horizontally with wrapping, search box visible in header

steps.expected: Layout should transition to tablet/mobile mode
steps.actual: Navigation switched to mobile mode with 'Menu' button, PersonaBar remained on left side, confirmed responsive breakpoint between 992px and 1200px

steps.expected: Layout should be optimized for small mobile screens
steps.actual: Mobile menu expanded showing vertical navigation, long page names wrapped within available width, PersonaBar icon-only visible, search box visible below header

steps.expected: PersonaBar submenus should be accessible on mobile
steps.actual: Content submenu expanded correctly as touch-friendly overlay showing Assets, Pages, Forms, Content Library, Recycle Bin options, Assets panel displayed folder tiles clearly

observations: The responsive breakpoint for navigation collapse appears to be between 992px and 1200px width
PersonaBar maintains a consistent icon-only sidebar across all viewport sizes, which may reduce usability on very small screens as it always occupies horizontal space
Touch interactions on mobile are supported through appropriately sized tap targets in the PersonaBar and navigation menus
The Pages panel details form is hidden on mobile portrait view (375px) and requires horizontal scrolling or selecting a specific page - this could be improved with a toggle or stacked layout
